about_the_game:
Relax away from the shark-infested waters and enjoy the sounds of Depth - including music and ambience from the game as well as Depth trailer music.

1. Main Theme
2. Divers Win Round
3. Sharks Win Round
4. Round Ending
5. Blood and Gold Trailer Music
6. Big Catch Trailer Music
7. ShipWrecked Trailer Music
8. Whiplash Trailer
9. GDC2012 Trailer Music
10. Antiguo Level Ambience
11. Fractured Level Ambience
12. Galleon Level Ambience
13. Temple Level Ambience
14. Full Action Soundscape
